document_data.name: ''Cube of Force''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cube of force''''' was a magical item used to create barriers.
document_data.Description: A ''cube of force'' measured {{SI|1|in|c|long=yes}} across each face. Each side had a unique design. They were made of either bone, ivory, or metal.
document_data.Powers: A cube was activated when an individual pressed on one side of the cube. Each cube held 36 magical charges and one was discharged when a side was pressed. When pressed, a magical barrier {{SI|15|ft|long=yes}} wide per side was created, centered on the individual, with each side of the cube creating a barrier with different properties. The barrier remained in place for up to a minute or until deactivated.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Heptios|Heptios the Archmage]], philosopher of [[Cimbar]]
* [[Hoch Miraz]], a [[wizard]] from [[Calimshan]].
